record.id: field.name=NULL and file.name=NULL and term="introimport" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"

brief.brief: Use the import program to import certain fields from an external flat fixed length file to a table.

detail.detail: The import utility works with the database load utility. It can run in either foreground or background.

To use the import utility, fill in the import descriptor record and press import. The import utility displays the import descriptor record and imports all records in the external file. It validates the import descriptor record before adds and updates. When you press Load, the import program displays a load description, including the external dataset name to import.
The import utility uses the database load and unload configuration record using a RAW format.
